title: Update Standard Profiles doc on Support

cells.data:
To update: http://support.brightcove.com/en/video-cloud/docs/standard-ingest-profiles:

  1. Open http://docs.brightcove.com/en/video-cloud/di-api/guides/standard-profiles-support-site.html
  2. From the Developer Tools>Elements, copy and paste just the HTML inside the body (no script tags) into:
    • BCL-developer-docs/en/video-cloud/di-api/guides/generated-profile-data-support-site.html (overwrite what’s there)
  3. Edit the support doc, go to source, and paste the same HTML code in, overwriting everything there
